name: Time Episode
summary: Time Episode is an eight level fan add-on for Blood created by Pyro on September 17, 1999. The player is a mass murderer who in a fit of remorse, or because the authorities have finally caught up to him, leaps off a tall building to end it all, and is sent to hell. From thereon out it is his quest to escape hell through a time gate and then make it back to his own time.
